channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Game Subscription Services That We've Tested (2024)
item.description: PlayStation Plus Extra or Premium? Xbox Game Pass Core or Ultimate? We break everything down so you can spend more time playing.

item.title: A Mysterious Hacking Group Has 2 New Tools to Steal Data From Air-Gapped Machines
item.description: It's hard enough creating one air-gap-jumping tool. Researchers say the group GoldenJackal did it twice in five years.

item.title: Anthropic CEO goes full techno-optimist in 15,000-word paean to AI

item.title: Researchers question AI’s ‘reasoning’ ability as models stumble on math problems with trivial changes

item.title: Sony Linkbuds Open Review: Better Battery, Softer Sound
item.description: Sony’s updated open earbuds add better battery life and a different sound signature for all-day wearability.
